title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 147.2 - Establishment of Superior Court sex offense parts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 147.2 - Establishment of Superior Court sex offense parts

State Regulations

Following consultation with and agreement
of the Presiding Justice of the Judicial Department in which a county is
located, the Chief Administrator of the Courts, by administrative order, may
establish a sex offense part in Supreme Court or County Court in such county
and assign one or more justices or judges to preside therein. Such sex offense
part shall be devoted to the hearing and determination, in a single forum, of

Sex Offense Part-eligible cases in accordance with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
147.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
